QuestData.Title: WANTED: Prime Thumpknuckle
QuestData.Description: To any and all brave enough to seek the challenge: $b$bFind and defeat a Prime Thumpknuckle, the largest and most dangerous of all the wild gorillas.$b$bThey can be found up and down the road from the Village in the Vines. $b$bA reward for any that succeed!
QuestData.RewardText: You faced down those Thumpknuckles? Dat is worth a lot to us. Thank you.
